issue.title: [Doc] Arrow API Functionality Reference Table
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14994](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14994). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Create a higher level table of what’s available and what is still to come in Arrow. The table will reference the cookbook showing which higher level API's are available or not. Initial draft will be created in the form of an Excel Sheet.
